gameplay.description:
Dash Back and Hold Block for 1.5 Seconds
The Hood gains Invisibility for 8 seconds. While Invisible, incoming attacks have a 45% chance to miss. Non-contact attacks have double this chance.

While Invisible, The Hood deals 105% increased Critical Damage and his attacks ignore 75% Armor and Block Proficiency.

attack.heavy: Refreshes any Shock, Hex, Stagger or Bleed The Hood has placed on the opponent.
attack.description:
Critical Hits

60% chance to Stagger the opponent, preventing them from gaining their next Buff for 10 seconds. When the Stagger expires, the opponent’s Health is siphoned to The Hood for 15% of his Attack.

1.name: Eldritch Arc
1.description: Shocks the opponent, dealing 130% of the Hood’s Attack as Energy Damage over 7.5 seconds. When the Shock expires, the opponent is Stunned for 0.75 seconds. This effect cannot interrupt Special Attacks.

2.name: Occult Onslaught
2.description: Hexes the opponent, reducing Ability Accuracy by 56% and Fate Sealing for 6.5 seconds. When the Hex expires, it deals a burst of Energy Damage equal to 85% of the Hood’s attack.

3.name: Dark Pact
3.description: This attack deals 65% increased damage for each full bar of power the opponent has at time of impact.
3.note: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 130% of your Attack as direct damage over 6 seconds.
